titleInfo.title: M.C. Wilcox in Knoxville, TN to Gen. John Eaton in Nashville, TN

subject.geographic: Tennessee -- Officials and employees -- Selection and appointment.

subject.topic: Reconstruction and the freedmen: appearance of hitherto undocumented people in legal records; the fastening of sharecropping on the countryside.

mods.note: Instructions for sending Eaton`s manuscript for a pamphlet which they hope to have ready for the public by mid-November. Asks his recommendation for a Union man to take his present position as a member of the board of trustees. Mentions condition of schools in Knoxville.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
